title: Document Alacritty releases Linux distro support
body:
After updating alacritty to version 0.3.0 every time I open it I see only a black screen. After some time the prompt appears but the font is not correctly rendered.

Using the default alacritty.yml does not solve the problem.

Downgrading to version 0.2.9 solves the problem.
